{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3642550,"name":"Johnny Dreher","username":"johnnydreher","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/johnnydreher/{size}/213751_2.png","created_at":"2025-06-01T19:47:25.084Z","cooked":"

Greetings, Everyone.

During this time when teams are learning new things and practicing a lot, we from Techmaker FRC 9047 and FTC 23069 pleased to invite you to participate in the First Tech Summit, a CAD-A-Thon open to all FIRST teams.

It’s a great opportunity to take part in an off-season robotics event.

We’ll have a panel of judges who will provide feedback to teams — feedback you can use to improve your team’s design process.

A single FIRST team can register as many entries as they want, with a maximum of two participants and one mentor per entry.
The mentor may participate in multiple entries.

Our goal is to expand opportunities and create a CAD project database to support teams

For more information:

sites.google.com

Techmaker

Sejam bem-vindos ao FIRST Tech Summit 2025! Estão prontos?
